data.title: Galloways

data.text:
Galloways is one of the long-standing agencies in London, having been established over 30 years ago. We are proud of the strong reputation we have built from many years successfully representing and developing the careers of our clients.

Galloways is active in screen, theatre, musical theatre, commercials and radio. Whilst we are based in London, we have relationships with managers/agents in LA and NYC and can offer joint representation arrangements to assist some of our clients.

Jilly, who has run the agency for over 25 years, heads an experienced team who have represented actors in a huge array of leading productions and commercials across various media in the UK and the US as well as Europe. Benefitting from a broad network of close and long-standing relationships with many of the leading Producers, Directors and Casting Directors gives Galloways a strong competitive advantage which our clients benefit from.

Galloways are a very pro-active and close-knit team who focus on the individual needs of our actors, some of whom have been with us throughout their careers. We work as a partnership with our clients with passion, commitment, dedication and drive to nurture and support, offering a full-career management service to our very talented list.

We have also been proud members and sponsors of numerous industry organisations from the pma to the Black British Theatre Awards.

Neal’s career started more than 30 years ago at Gloucestershire’s Everyman Theatre in Cheltenham with its’ award-winning Youth Theatre.

Atfer graduating from Arts Educational School London, he then embarked upon a diverse and successful performing career in various productions in the West End and touring the UK and Europe. Neal also worked on screen which envolved everything from short films to presenting.

Now as an agent for nearly two decades, Neal has developed a strong passion for personal management and relishes helping clients find the right career path guiding their progress within the industry.

Being part of this new team at Galloways, is an exciting and challenging adventure.
